name: KEKW_SuperBreakout_PinBall
description: El Risitas is a famous Mexican comedian that was additionally popularized in the WoW Classic community by a live streamer named ‘Jokerd’. Risitas’s laugh is particularly funny sounding and has a tendency to make others laugh as well. Jokerd caused the entire platform of Twitch to embrace KEKW as an emote that expresses laughter.
